alert.note: Alert for East Carteret; Mainland Hyde; Pamlico (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 22 at 2:56PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Hyde, northeastern Carteret and northeastern Pamlico Counties through 345 PM EST... At 255 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Lowland to near Open Grounds Farm. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cedar Island, North River, Swindell Fork, Gull Rock, New Holland, Open Grounds Farm, Lake Landing, Lake Mattamuskeet, Swan Quarter Ferry Terminal and Cedar Island Ferry Terminal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
